### conda or pip

### python version

### library version

Please execute the command and paste result.

* conda

    ```.bash
    conda list
    ```

* pip

    ```.bash
    python -m pip list
    python -c 'import rdkit; print("rdkit " + rdkit.__version__)'
    ```
